original_text:
Rather, as it is written:
“Those who were not told about him will see,
    and those who have not heard will understand.”
korean_text: 기록된 바 주의 소식을 받지 못한 자들이 볼 것이요 듣지 못한 자들이 깨달으리라 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Those who were not told about him will see,
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대해 듣지 못한 자들이 볼 것이요,

sentences.original_text: and those who have not heard will understand.
